title: Need help asap
body:
I am not banned, thought i do have a time penalty after having to be forced to log off LoL because your client won't run- both new and old! It has nothing to do with running as an admin!

I get a stupid Directrix program message which as I saw in the installation process SHOULD BE ALREADY ON MY PC! SO why is it giving me an error message and refuses to let me play and basically letting the other 4 players down!?

Sorry for the caps lock and probably rude attitude, but seriously, what is it now!? I have already tried to youtube to fix this problem! To which obviously their solutions did not work- or I wouldn't be here.

Anyone else with this issue? please up vote, I don't understand why this is happening to me

replies.body:
DirectX errors with League will happen if your PC is missing DirectX 9 packages that League needs in order to run properly or if the packages in your directory are corrupt. I recommend running all available windows updates, then installing [**this standalone DirectX package**](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=34429) from Microsoft.

Let me know if this resolved the issue. ^.^
I am getting an error msg that basically tells me I cannot download the Directrix program because I have windows 10?
Did you ensure to install all available windows updates before attempting to install the standalone package? If not, give it another go after rebooting your PC.

Yes, it even says I'm updated; and I rebooted anyways- I still cannot download the program you're asking me too because I do not have "2003 Windows Server family" whatever that means. I know you are a support man and probably know way more about PCs than I, but are you sure you gave me the right download link??

Yeah, that package should install just fine without error. Try the [**DirectX Web Installer**](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=35) instead, as you may be missing more than one DirectX package.

Let me know the results.

Yes it seems this has worked, before I could not even open a custom game, but now I can so I am to assume it does indeed work now. Thank you so much for your patience with me in helping me fix whatever issue prevented the game loading.
ty for your response, I will let you know shortly, or well after however long it takes to download LoL again

All you need  is to right click the application, and then click on my application cannot be opened, and then you select the option(windows xp) them you are supposed to be able to continue  with your game.
I don't think you're understanding; it won't even download the application (you are talking about DirectX, yes).
